${ModID}:DivineProtection.NAME: Защита Змекко
DESCRIPTIONS: Может лишиться ещё только #b%d ОЗ в этом ходу.
Больше не может быть ранен в этом ходу.
NL Снимается после гибели «%s».

${ModID}:Split.NAME: Деление
DESCRIPTIONS: Делится на #b2 меньших слизня, потеряв #b75%. Запас ОЗ, который имеет
на момент деления, определяет ОЗ слизней.

${ModID}:PainfulPunches.NAME: Болезненные удары
DESCRIPTIONS: Добавляет #yРану на верх стопки добора, когда вы теряете ОЗ от атак этого врага.

${ModID}:SneckoBot.NAME: Snecko Bot
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, chooses a random number from #b0 to #b3. If the number is equal to the cost of the card played, gains #b
#yStrength.

${ModID}:ExplodingSporeCloud.NAME: Exploding Spore Cloud
DESCRIPTIONS: In #b%2$d turns, applies #b%1$d #yVulnerable. NL On death, applies #b%1$d #yVulnerable.
On death, applies #b%1$d #yVulnerable.

${ModID}:DoubleTime.NAME: Double Time
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b%d cards, gains #b%d #yStrength.

${ModID}:DeathRattle.NAME: Death Rattle
DESCRIPTIONS: On death, puts #b%d #yDazed on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Hex.NAME: Hex
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, shuffle #b
#yDazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:VenomStrikes.NAME: Venom Strikes
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive attack damage from this enemy, gain #b%d #yVenom.

${ModID}:Venom.NAME: Venom
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, take #b%d damage, then reduce #yVenom by #b%d.

${ModID}:SemiIntangible.NAME: Semi-Intangible
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce ALL damage taken and HP loss by #b%d this turn. #ySemi-Intangible is reapplied every other turn.

${ModID}:SlimeCoating.NAME: Extra Slimy
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of its turn, adds #b%d #ySlimed into your discard pile.

${ModID}:DemonFormMonster.NAME: Demon Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of its turn, gains #b%d #yStrength.

${ModID}:FatedShapes.NAME: Fated Shapes
DESCRIPTIONS: %1$s and %2$s have shared HP.
